Responses.InvalidArguments: Uh oh! {user}, it looks like you didn't use this command's proppor arguments. Here's an example to help you out: `{prefix}{command}{arguments}`!

InvalidPermisions.Bot: Uh oh! I don't have permission to do that. Please select my role and allow **{permission}**.
InvalidPermisions.User: Uh oh! You don't have permission to do that. You need **{permission}**.
InvalidPermisions.URL: {author} sent a url, but I cannot delete it. Please give me permision to delete messages. (MANAGE_MESSAGES)
